page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: 1 Our class sent about 90 surveys to different houses in our region, in the households who filled in a form there are approx. 168 people. Out of which there were 72 children. The table below shows the distribution of these children through schools in the area. { Approx. % Approx. % Infant 10 | secondary 23 Primary 8 | College 3 Junior 46 | Work 6 {3 % are of a pre-school age. Out of the 104(approx.) adults the following results were found. 42% - do not work 54% - work (Exc. house work) 4% - go to college. {PEOPLE PER HOUSE}- The most common being a household of 2 people then 3,4 & 5 people per houshold consecutively, with a few households of 7 people.
